name: ConceptMapR5InvoiceElementsForR4Invoice
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Invoice` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.meta`.
Element `Invoice.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.implicitRules`.
Element `Invoice.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.language`.
Element `Invoice.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.text`.
Element `Invoice.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.contained`.
Element `Invoice.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.identifier`.
Element `Invoice.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.status`.
Element `Invoice.cancelledReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.cancelledReason`.
Element `Invoice.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.type`.
Element `Invoice.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.subject`.
Element `Invoice.recipient` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.recipient`.
Element `Invoice.date` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.date`.
Element `Invoice.creation` is will have a context of Invoice based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice.period[x]` is will have a context of Invoice based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice.participant` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.participant`.
Element `Invoice.participant.role` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.participant.role`.
Element `Invoice.participant.actor` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.participant.actor`.
Element `Invoice.issuer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.issuer`.
Element `Invoice.account` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.account`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.lineItem`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem.sequence` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.lineItem.sequence`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem.serviced[x]` is will have a context of Invoice.lineItem based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.

Note that the target element context `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Invoice.lineItem`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Invoice.lineItem`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem.priceComponent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.lineItem.priceComponent`.
Element `Invoice.totalPriceComponent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.totalPriceComponent`.
Element `Invoice.totalNet` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.totalNet`.
Element `Invoice.totalGross` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.totalGross`.
Element `Invoice.paymentTerms` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.paymentTerms`.
Element `Invoice.note` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.note`.
